thread.title: A must for NYC!
thread.title_full: A must for NYC! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cgideon
title: A must for NYC!
text: This hotel is close to everything! Our group had a wonderful time. The only downside was the hotel was remodeling the kitchen, so we had to eat breakfast elsewhere. And even that was bad because there is a grocery across the street and restaurants everywhere. The staff was friendly. The cleaning staff was very kind and nice. The rooms were very clean. We did have to change rooms because the windows didn't lock, but they moved us into an even better room! Again, great service!
